indexes.description: a list of paths to input indexes to anchor

anchorAssembly.description: path to fasta file for the anchor/reference assembly

anchorChromSizeDict.description: dictionary/object mapping assembly abbreviations to assembly file names (basenames only, e.g. Gmax_MU-041.v1.softmasked.fa.gz)

uniqueID.description: uniqueID for maybe distinguishing output from different runs

localDirPath.description: e.g. /data1/hechen/MUsoyGenomes/ <-- must include trailing forward slash

threads.description: the number of threads to use for mapping
